scripts.setup: concurrently "npm i --prefix auth-service && npx prisma generate --prefix auth-service && npx prisma migrate dev --name init --prefix auth-service" "npm i --prefix payment-service && npx prisma generate --prefix payment-service && npx prisma migrate dev --name init --prefix payment-service" "npm i --prefix notification-service"
scripts.dev: concurrently "docker compose -f docker-compose.db.yml up -d" "npm run start:dev --prefix auth-service" "npm run start:dev --prefix notification-service" "npm run start:dev --prefix payment-service" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.start: npm run setup && npm run dev
